text: khanditavagiyu, allahanannu mattavana dutarannu dhikkarisuvavaru hagu allahana mattavana dutara naduve taratamya maduvavaru mattu ‘‘navu avaralli (dutaralli) kelavarannu nambutteve mattu kelavarannu tiraskarisutteve’’ ennuvavaru mattu avugala (satya-mithyagala) naduve berondu margavannu hudukuttiruvavaru –
